verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: sleep] [ARGM-LOC: on an adjustable bed frame that has a massage function and a zero gravity setting with the nectar adjustable bed frame you do n't have to lie entirely horizontally when you lie down to go to bed] this new bed frame allows you to decide what angle works best for your nightly repose whether that entirely supine or with your legs or back just a little bit elevated sleep nectar bed
